network.loading: В зависимост от размера на мрежата и качеството на връзките, това може да отнеме известно време.
network.copy_paste_on: Копирайте и поставете следните данни в един от наличните онлайн гледачи/редактори.
network.highlight_info: Кликнете върху изображението на устройството, за да го подчертаете автоматично.
network.legend_node_siblings: Показани са само най-високо оценените съседни, които би трябвало приблизително да съответстват на действителните връзки в мрежата.
network.legend_node_select: Избирането на възел ще избере зависимата част от мрежата на един скок.
network.legend_node_fold: Бутонът за сгъване/разгъване в контекстното меню на възела ще засегне зависимата част от мрежата.
network.legend_edge_toggle: Превключването на ребрата на връзките ще промени оформлението. При деактивиране на едно или повече, действителното оформление на мрежата вече не се представя точно.
network.begin_info_type: Типът се използва за извличане на различен формат на мрежовата карта. Външните са предназначени да бъдат копирани за използване извън интерфейса (дават се примерни уебсайтове след генериране).
network.begin_info_routes: Активирането на маршрути ще извлече таблицата с маршрути от устройствата (не всички координатори/устройства поддържат това, но неуспехите не трябва да пречат на зареждането на останалите данни). В момента това се използва само в дисплея 'данни'.
network.begin_info_display: Типът дисплей позволява превключване между изглед, ориентиран към данни, и изглед на карта.

ota.update_selected_info: OTA актуализацията натоварва силно мрежата. Уверете се, че е стабилна и изберете по-малко използвани времена.
ota.empty_ota_message: В момента няма устройство, което поддържа OTA
ota.schedule_info: Ще се актуализира при следващата OTA заявка от устройството

settings.donation_text: Тук можете да ни благодарите за цялата тежка работа. Не се колебайте да кажете и нещо хубаво ;)
settings.translation_prompt: Можете да помогнете с превода на
settings.frontend_notice: Тези настройки се съхраняват локално във вашия браузър. Използването на частни прозорци или изчистването на кеша ще ги върне към настройките по подразбиране.

health.interview_info: Интервютата с устройствата могат силно да повлияят на тези данни.

zigbee.force_remove_notice: Използвайте само като последна възможност (няма да се разпространи в мрежата)
zigbee.read_write_attributes: Четене / писане на атрибути от клъстер на крайна точка

devConsole.state_property_info: Задайте резултата в състоянието на устройството (само за четене)
devConsole.mqtt_topic_info: Пропуснете 'base_topic', фронтенд съобщенията се изпращат чрез WebSocket директно до Zigbee2MQTT.
devConsole.codespace_info: A Github Кодspace is available to help in development

settingsSchemaDescriptions.homeassistant-discovery_topic: Тема за откриване на Home Assistant
settingsSchemaDescriptions.homeassistant-status_topic: Тема за състоянието на Home Assistant
settingsSchemaDescriptions.homeassistant-legacy_action_sensor: Home Assistant legacy actions sensor, when enabled a action sensor will be discoverd and an empty `action` will be send after every published action.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.homeassistant-experimental_event_entitie: Home Assistant experimental event entities, when enabled Zigbee2MQTT will add event entities for exposed actions. The events and attributes are currently deemed experimental and subject to change.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.availability-active: Опции за активни устройства (рутери/захранени от мрежата)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.availability-active-timeout: Time after which an active device will be marked as offline in минути
settingsSchemaDescriptions.availability-active-max_jitter: Максimum jitter (in msec) allowed on timeout to avoid availability pings trying to trigger around the same time
settingsSchemaDescriptions.availability-active-backoff: Активирай timeout backoff on failed availability pings (x1.5, x3, x6, x12...)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.availability-active-pause_on_backoff_gt: Pause availability pings when backoff reaches over this limit until a new Zigbee message is received from the device. A value of zero disables pausing.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.availability-passive: Опции за пасивни устройства (предимно с батерии)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.availability-passive-timeout: Time after which an passive device will be marked as offline in минути
settingsSchemaDescriptions.mqtt-base_topic: MQTT base topic for Zigbee2MQTT MQTT messages
settingsSchemaDescriptions.mqtt-server: MQTT server URL (use mqtts:// for SSL/TLS connection)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.mqtt-ca: Absolute path to SSL/TLS certificate of CA used to sign server and client certificates
settingsSchemaDescriptions.mqtt-key: Absolute path to SSL/TLS key for client-authentication
settingsSchemaDescriptions.mqtt-cert: Absolute path to SSL/TLS certificate for client-authentication
settingsSchemaDescriptions.mqtt-include_device_information: Include device inзаmation to mqtt съобщения
settingsSchemaDescriptions.mqtt-force_disable_retain: Деактивирай retain for all send messages. ONLY enable if your MQTT broker doesn't support retained message (e.g. AWS IoT core, Azure IoT Hub, Google Cloud IoT core, IBM Watson IoT Platform). Enabling will break the Home Assistant integration
settingsSchemaDescriptions.mqtt-maximum_packet_size: Specifies the maximum allowed packet length (in bytes) that the server can send to Zigbee2MQTT. NOTE: The same value exists in your MQTT broker but for the length the client can send to it instead.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.serial-port: Location of the adapter. To autodetect the port, set null
settingsSchemaDescriptions.serial-disable_led: Деактивирай LED of the adapter if supported
settingsSchemaDescriptions.serial-adapter: Тип адаптер, не е необходим освен ако не изпитвате проблеми
settingsSchemaDescriptions.serial-baudrate: Baud rate speed for the serial port. This must match what the firmware on your adapter supports (most commonly 115200).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.serial-rtscts: RTS / CTS Hardware Flow Control за serial порт
settingsSchemaDescriptions.blocklist: Блокиране на устройства от мрежата (по ieeeAddr)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.passlist: Allow only certain devices to join the network (by ieeeAddr). Note that all devices not on the passlist will be removed from the network!
settingsSchemaDescriptions.ota-update_check_interval: Your device may request a check for a new firmware update. This value determines how frequently third party servers may actually be contacted to look for firmware updates. The value is set in минути, and the default is 1 day.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.ota-disable_automatic_update_check: Zigbee devices may request a firmware update, and do so frequently, causing Zigbee2MQTT to reach out to third party servers. If you disable these device initiated checks, you can still initiate a firmware update check manually.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.ota-zigbee_ota_override_index_location: Location of override OTA index file
settingsSchemaDescriptions.ota-image_block_response_delay: Limits the rate of requests (in milliсекунди) during OTA актуализацияs to reduce network congestion. You can increase this value if your network appears unstable during OTA.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.ota-default_maximum_data_size: The size of file chunks sent during an update (in bytes). Note: This value may get ignored for manufacturers that require specific values.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.frontend-port: Frontend binding port. Ignored when using a unix domain socket
settingsSchemaDescriptions.frontend-host: Frontend binding host. Свържиs to a unix socket when an absolute path is given instead.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.frontend-url: URL on which the frontend can be reached, currently only used for the Home Assistant device configuration page
settingsSchemaDescriptions.frontend-ssl_cert: SSL Certificate file path for exposing HTTPS. The sibling property 'ssl_key' must be set for HTTPS to be activated.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.frontend-ssl_key: SSL key file path for exposing HTTPS. The sibling property 'ssl_cert' must be set for HTTPS to be activated.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.frontend-base_url: Base URL for the frontend. If hosted under a subpath, e.g. 'http://localhost:8080/z2m', set this to '/z2m'
settingsSchemaDescriptions.frontend-notification_filter: Hide frontend notifications matching specified regex strings. Example: 'z2m: Неуспешно: ping.*'
settingsSchemaDescriptions.frontend-disable_ui_serving: If true, the frontend UI is not served, only the WebSocket is maintained by Zigbee2MQTT (you are required to serve a standalone UI yourself as needed).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-log_symlink_current: Create symlink to current logs in the log directory
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-log_output: Output location of the log, leave empty to suppress logging
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-log_file: Име на лог файла, може да съдържа и timestamp
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-log_namespaced_levels: Задайте индивидуални нива на логиране за определени пространства от имена
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-log_debug_to_mqtt_frontend: Логирай debug ниво към MQTT и фронтенд (може да намали общата производителност)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-log_debug_namespace_ignore: Не логирай тези пространства от имена (базирани на regex) за debug ниво
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-log_directories_to_keep: Брой лог директории за запазване преди да се изтрие най-старата
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-log_syslog-host: The host running syslogd, defaults to localhost.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-log_syslog-port: The port on the host that syslog is running on, defaults to syslogd's default port.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-log_syslog-protocol: The network protocol to log over (e.g. tcp4, udp4, tls4, unix, unix-connect, etc).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-log_syslog-path: The path to the syslog dgram socket (i.e. /dev/log or /var/run/syslog for OS X).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-log_syslog-pid: PID of the process that log messages are coming from (Default process.pid).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-log_syslog-localhost: Host to indicate that log messages are coming from (Default: localhost).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-log_syslog-type: The type of the syslog protocol to use (Default: BSD, also valid: 5424).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-log_syslog-app_name: The name of the application (Default: Zigbee2MQTT).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-log_syslog-eol: The end of line character to be added to the end of the message (Default: Съобщение without modifications).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-pan_id: ZigBee pan ID, промяната изисква повторно сдвояване на всички устройства!
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-ext_pan_id: Zigbee разширен pan ID, промяната изисква повторно сдвояване на всички устройства!
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-channel: Zigbee канал, промяната може да изисква повторно сдвояване на някои устройства! (Забележка: използвайте ZLL канал: 11, 15, 20 или 25, за да избегнете проблеми)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-adapter_concurrent: Adapter concurrency (e.g. 2 for CC2531 or 16 for CC26X2R1) (default: null, uses recommended value)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-cache_state: MQTT message payload will contain all attributes, not only changed ones. Has to be true when integrating via Home Assistant
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-cache_state_persistent: Запазване на кеширано състояние, използва се само когато cache_state: true
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-cache_state_send_on_startup: Изпращане на кеширано състояние при стартиране, използва се само когато cache_state: true
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-last_seen: Добавяне на атрибут last_seen към MQTT съобщенията, съдържа дата/час на последното Zigbee съобщение
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-elapsed: Add an elapsed attribute to MQTT messages, contains milliсекунди since the previous msg
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-network_key: Мрежа encryption key, changing requires re-pairing all devices!
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-transmit_power: Мощност на предаване на адаптера, налична само за Z-Stack (CC253*/CC2652/CC1352) адаптери, CC2652 = 5dbm, CC1352 максимум е 20dbm (5dbm по подразбиране)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.advanced-output: Примери когато 'state' на устройство се публикува json: тема: 'zigbee2mqtt/my_bulb' payload '{"state": "ON"}' атрибут: тема 'zigbee2mqtt/my_bulb/state' payload 'ON' attribute_and_json: и json, и атрибут (вижте по-горе)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.health: Periodically check the health of Zigbee2MQTT
settingsSchemaDescriptions.health-reset_on_check: If true, will reset stats every time the health check is executed (only applicable to stats that can be reset).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.definitions-device-friendly_name: Used in the MQTT topic of a device. By default this is the device ID
settingsSchemaDescriptions.definitions-device-retain: Retain MQTT messages of this device
settingsSchemaDescriptions.definitions-device-disabled: Деактивирайs the device (excludes device from network scans, availability and group state updates)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.definitions-device-retention: Sets the MQTT Съобщение Expiry in секунди, Make sure to set mqtt.version to 5
settingsSchemaDescriptions.definitions-device-qos: QoS level for MQTT messages of this device
settingsSchemaDescriptions.definitions-device-throttle: The minimum time between payloads in секунди. Payloads received whilst the device is being throttled will be discarded
settingsSchemaDescriptions.definitions-device-debounce_ignore: Защитава уникални стойности на определени свойства от презаписване в рамките на debounce времето
settingsSchemaDescriptions.definitions-device-optimistic: Публикуване на оптимистично състояние след задаване
settingsSchemaDescriptions.definitions-device-filtered_attributes: Filter attributes with regex from published payload.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.definitions-device-filtered_cache: Filter attributes with regex from being added to the cache, this prevents the attribute from being in the published payload when the value didn't change.
settingsSchemaDescriptions.definitions-device-filtered_optimistic: Filter attributes with regex from optimistic publish payload when calling /set. (This has no effect if optimistic is set to false).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.definitions-device-icon: The user-defined device icon for the frontend. It can be a full URL link to an image (e.g. https://SOME.SITE/MODEL123.jpg) or a path to a local file inside the `device_icons` directory (e.g. device_icons/MODEL123.png).
settingsSchemaDescriptions.definitions-device-homeassistant-name: Name of the device in Home Assistant
settingsSchemaDescriptions.definitions-group-qos: QoS level for MQTT messages of this group
settingsSchemaDescriptions.definitions-group-off_state: Control when to publish state OFF or CLOSE for a group. 'all_members_off': only publish state OFF/CLOSE when all group members are in state OFF/CLOSE,  'last_member_state': publish state OFF whenever one of its members changes to OFF
